Text: S03E04 "Drift Problem" A9V9  If you count the three part "Heart of Archness" episodes then this would be episode 7.  Either way great show, new season is awesome!
lol guys the "Heart of Archness" is a "mini-arc concluding season two's cliffhanger" and not part of season 2 or 3

If you think you ALREADY have the 1st 3 episodes of this, or have already seen them, from BEFORE January, then you have what I have- 3 ep's that are mislabeled as S3E1, S3E2, & S3E3.

Go back & start at Season 3 Episode 1, because you might not have/have seen them
